title: Subchapter C - State Hospital Code
content:
Subchapter C - State Hospital Code

State Regulations

Article 1 - General Provisions (Part 700 to 709)

Article 2 - Medical Facility Construction (Part 710 to 717)

Article 3 - Hospital Operation (Part 720 to 724)

Article 4 - Managed Care (Part 730 to 742)

Article 6 - Treatment Center and Diagnostic Center Operation (Part 750 to 759)

Article 7 - Certified Home Health Agencies and Licensed Home Care Services Agencies (Part 760 to 782)

Article 9 - Hospice Operation (Part 790 to 794)

Article 10 - Midwifery Birth Centers (Part 795)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
